name: Destroy Base Terrorists Missio
description:
Destroy Base Terrorists Mission is a fast-paced modern FPS counter terrorist game. Where you and your team fight against terrorists, fight against secret terrorist activities and destroy the base of terrorists. No time to hesitate, take real action to dismantle terrorist organizations! In the game you are a well-trained special forces soldiers. You will confront the mysterious terrorist organization. You need to go deep into the enemy, destroy the base of terrorists, step by step to explore useful clues to eliminate the hidden terrorists. You need to destroy all the terrorists, you are to defend the heroes of justice.
Features:
- Realistic and challenging FPS games
- Real combat experience
- Fight terrorists around the world
- High quality picture
- Shocked music and sound effects
- Super real 3D model
- All kinds of fine weapons
- Highly realistic shooting effect.
